original_title: Sri Lanka’s shares edge up in mid day trade
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka‘s shares edge up in mid day trade on Monday, Colombo Stock Exchange data showed.
The main All Share Price Index  was up 0.07 percent or 6.43 points to 8,760.23, while the most liquid index was S&P SL20 was up 0.11 percent or 2.66 points to 2,489.95 as at 120o hours.
The market generated a turnover of 274 million rupees during mid day trade.
Top gainers were Vallibel One, Sampath Bank and Browns Investment. (Colombo/June05/2023)
